bsfrc-revreview-check-flag-p-title: Accept the result of the pending changes and the changes you made here. Use this only if you have already seen the entire pending changes diff.
bsfrc-revreview-check-flag-u-title: Accept this version of the page. Only use this if you have already seen the entire page.
bsfrc-revreview-check-flag-y-title: Accept all the changes that you have made here.

bsfrc-copyrightwarning2:
Please note that all contributions to {{SITENAME}} may be edited, altered, or removed by other contributors. If you do not want your writing to be edited mercilessly, then do not submit it here.
You are also promising us that you wrote this yourself, or copied it from a public domain or similar free resource. Do not submit copyrighted work without permission!
